thread.title: Twitter Flips Out Over Remy Ma's Nicki Minaj Diss Track "ShETHER"
thread.title_full: Twitter Flips Out Over Remy Ma's Nicki Minaj Diss Track "ShETHER"

author: Trevor Smith
title: Twitter Flips Out Over Remy Ma's Nicki Minaj Diss Track "ShETHER"
text:
Home > Music > Twitter Flips Out Over Remy Ma's Nicki Minaj Diss Track "ShETHER" Twitter Flips Out Over Remy Ma's Nicki Minaj Diss Track "ShETHER" 17 0 Posted by Trevor Smith , Feb 25, 2017 at 03:43pm Fans were as quick with the memes as Remy was with the response. 
Some say social media has ruined beef, but anyone who's cycled through Twitter after a diss track drops will tell you that is a lie. When Remy Ma decided to drop an unrelentingly personal 7-minute diss aimed at Nicki Minaj today, social media was ready with gifs, jokes, and takes. Naturally, people took sides, but there was shared sense of shock at the unfiltered bars and stinging punchlines Remy brought out.If you're not caught up yet, listen to the track here. Once you've heard it, take a look through some of the most memorable tweets about the beef below. Nicki, don't Meek this up. â€” Issa Rae (@IssaRae) February 25, 2017 LMFAOOO y'all are really too quick ! Wikipedia said Remy Ma killed Nicki Minaj already lma pic.twitter.com/vPspYkAIrA â€” Kaya Rosado ğŸ‘¸ğŸ½ (@Kayaa__) February 25, 2017 Dear diary, â€” Nicki Minaj Memories (@NickiThrowbacks) February 25, 2017 Nicki Minaj in the crib after hearing that remy ma diss track pic.twitter.com/vXxi21IW7G Nicki- to be the queen of rap,you gotta sell records, you gotta get plaquesRemy Ma- to be the queen of rap you gotta actually rap â€” Nicki Minaj News (@NickiWorldNews) February 25, 2017 the four stages of listening to remy ma ether nicki minaj #shether #NickiMinaj #remyma pic.twitter.com/7nXVPFD6RB â€” Quay pruitt (@Threwtalkin) February 25, 2017 When Remy Ma said Nicki booty exploded and Meek couldn't get no pwussy for 3 months pic.twitter.com/FER6uzpX4K Yoo remy used meek to diss nicki then dissed meek in the end..Jesus wept â€” King Davinci ğŸˆ‚ (@DaVincihaters12) February 25, 2017 Nicki: BeyoncÃ© said I was the Queen of Rap â€” Aisha Mira (@AyishaMiraClb) February 25, 2017 Y'all too young to remember Remy Ma dropping one of the hottest verses of 2004 before there even was a Nicki Minaj ğŸ™„ğŸ˜‚ğŸ˜‚ğŸ˜‚ pic.twitter.com/2ussnSUnXQ â€” Jesus Shuttlesworth (@_theycallmetrey) February 25, 2017 The entire TL after hearing that Nicki diss pic.twitter.com/nXmyy8N3sh â€” Jamaican man (@T0RONTO) February 25, 2017 Nicki: it's ok , they beyhive got my back NICKI: WHY AM I TRENDINGğŸ¤”*LISTENS TO "SHETHER"* pic.twitter.com/qR2TWgabKT â€” THE KID MERO ğŸ‡©ğŸ‡´ (@THEKIDMERO) February 25, 2017 Meek was in New Orleans telling niggas Nicki ass flipped inside out like a contact lens. â€” Lil Tea Thot (@Asia_Bean) February 25, 2017 WHEN NICKI HEARS HOW REMY SMOKED HER SHIT ON THIS SHIT pic.twitter.com/khHSVYn7tz â€” HOT 97 (@HOT97) February 25, 2017 when you're a nicki fan listening to remy ma's diss and you haven't heard a lie yet... pic.twitter.com/xrfFcbzk1M < class="robots-nocontent" rel=""> Feb 25, 2017 at 03:43pm 8.8K Views 
Minaj cites BeyoncÃ© and sales figures to claim superiority over Remy. Fans were as quick with the memes as Remy was with the response.

When Remy Ma decided to drop an unrelentingly personal 7-minute diss aimed at Nicki Minaj today, social media was ready with gifs, jokes, and takes.
